VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Taste Testing stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {below} the Taste Testing stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage In-Store Promotion?
VE.A: The value of stage In-Store Promotion is {184}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Product Concept?
VE.A: The value of stage Product Concept is {1595}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Product Concept, with a value of {1595}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is In-Store Promotion, with a value of {184}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {37} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1251? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 707? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {506}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {221}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {184}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 202 and 707? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {506}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {221}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, or from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Product Concept} to {Taste Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to stage {Launch in Market} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Product Concept} and {Taste Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Retail Placement} and {In-Store Promotion} stages.
